comments: Shared transliteration tests. In each test, the dev field is compulsory.

tests.dev: असय औषधिः ग्रन्थः! ॡकारो।ऽस्ति। नास्ति लेशोऽपि संशयः। कीलकम्? कूपिः?  काष्ठं भोः। शङ्कर! ज्ञानम्।  सञ्जीवय। १२३४५॥ ॐ तत्।
tests.iast_avagrahaDoesntWork: asaya auṣadhiḥ granthaḥ! ḹkāro.`sti. nāsti leś`opi saṃśayaḥ. kīlakam? kūpiḥ?  kāṣṭhaṃ bhoḥ. śaṅkara! jñānam.  sañjīvaya. 12345.. aum tat.
tests.iastDcs: asaya auṣadhiḥ granthaḥ! ḹkāro/'sti/ nāsti leśo'pi saṃśayaḥ/ kīlakam? kūpiḥ?  kāṣṭhaṃ bhoḥ/ śaṅkara! jñānam/  sañjīvaya/ 12345.. aum tat/

tests.optitrans: asaya auShadhiH granthaH! LLIkaaro|.asti| naasti lesho.api saMshayaH| kiilakam? kuupiH?  kAShThaM bhoH| shankara! jnaanam|  sanjiivaya| 12345|| OM tat|
tests.slp: asaya OzaDiH granTaH! XkAro.'sti. nAsti leSo'pi saMSayaH. kIlakam? kUpiH?  kAzWaM BoH. SaNkara! jYAnam.  saYjIvaya. 12345.. oM tat.
tests.wx: asaya ORaXiH granWaH! ḹkAro.'swi. nAswi leSo'pi saMSayaH. kIlakam? kUpiH?  kARTaM BoH. Safkara! jFAnam.  saFjIvaya. 12345.. oM waw.
